title: Hebrew Bible in English - Ten Commandments 1/3 Psalms 29 and 114
description:
First in a three part series on the revelation of the Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai. Psalm 29 and Psalm 114.

Join us on the Discord server. https://discord.gg/xvv6PPSQ
